snippet: John Koskinen, commissioner of the troubled Internal Revenue Service, must contend with budget cuts and intense animosity from Republicans.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: John Koskinen, commissioner of the troubled Internal Revenue Service, must contend with budget cuts and intense animosity from Republicans.

headline.main: For I.R.S. Chief, a Challenge Too Big to Pass Up
headline.print_headline: For I.R.S. Chief, a Challenge Too Big to Pass Up
